instructions: Put the charger on the table, aligned to the bottom of the table cloth.
Put the dinner fork to the left of the charger
Put the dinner knife to the right of the charger with the blade facing the charger.
Put the salad fork to the left of the dinner fork, centered in height to the dinner fork
put the salad knife to the right of the dinner knife with the blade facing the dinner knife.
put the soup spoon to the right of the salad knife, centered in height to the knife.
Put the dessert spoon horizontally above the charger, with the bowl of the spoon to the left
Put the dessert fork below the dessert spoon with the prongs facing right.
Put the bread plate to the upper left of the dinner plate.
Put the butter knife on the bread plate at a 45-degree angle with the blade pointing to the upper left.
Put the water glass to the upper right of the plate, just above the salad knife.
Put the napkin on the center of the plate.
